content: add a playful twist to your accessories collection with the jumbo xl scrunchie this oversized piece is perfect for keeping your hair pulled back or just to jazz up your wrist it s the perfect project for using leftover yarn or experimenting with colors and textures video tutorials are included for visual assistance **skill level ** beginner **materials needed ** * 5 5 0mm us 8 dpns * bor beginning of round * co cast-on dpns double-pointed * needles k knit round s round s * st s stitch es inches **sizing ** this scrunchie is one-size-fits-all it has a diameter and a circumference of 13 cm 5 in **yarn ** 140 128 yards meters skein lion brand skein tones 100% acrylic 170 m 185 yds per 3 5 oz in shade truffle ***note *** you can use any worsted-weight yarn gauge is not *super* important for this project but it can be helpful to ensure the scrunchie size comes out as intended
